Given full information: Parent_B ranks Nursery_A 3rd (after Nursery_B, Nursery_D) so may not apply immediately; Parent_D ranks Nursery_A 2nd (after Nursery_C) and may apply if Nursery_C doesn’t work out. Since only Parent_A contacted us this round, the strategic choice is to reject now to preserve the seat for higher-priority parents, accepting the risk of ending unmatched if they never apply. Because we prefer any listed parent to being unfilled, but we can wait at least one round to see if Parent_B/Parent_D approach.
